description.narrative: The project will improve patients' and health workers' safety in hospitals in Mongolia. It will (i) improve the safety of blood transfusions, (ii) strengthen medical waste management, and (iii) prevent and control hospital acquired infections. It complements previous Asian Development Bank (ADB) initiatives in the health sector in Mongolia.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Health (formerly Ministry of Health and Sports)

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Improved patient and health worker safety in project-supported hospitals in Mongolia

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

The number of hospitals complying with national standards for hazardous solid and liquid medical waste treatment in 5 tertiary and 16 secondary project-supported hospitals increases from 0 to 14 for hazardous liquid medical waste.

description.narrative: Improved patient and health worker safety in project-supported hospitals in Mongolia

title.narrative: By 2018, at least 90% of health care workers (82% women) in project-supported hospitals are vaccinated against hepatitis B (2011 baseline: 10%, sex, job tier, urban, and rural disaggregated).

description.narrative: Improved patient and health worker safety in project-supported hospitals in Mongolia

title.narrative: The number of hospitals complying with national standards for hazardous solid and liquid medical waste treatment in 5 tertiary and 16 secondary project-supported hospitals increases from 5 in 2012 to 19 in 2018 for solid hazardous medical waste.

description.narrative: Improved patient and health worker safety in project-supported hospitals in Mongolia

title.narrative: At least 95% of blood collected for transfusions in 27 blood banks is screened with polymerase chain reaction, ELISA, or rapid test methods by 2018 from estimated 70% tested by ELISA and rapid test methods in 2010.

description.narrative: Improved patient and health worker safety in project-supported hospitals in Mongolia
